price: 6. Dans l’alternance de la nuit et du jour, et dans ce qu’Il a créé dans les cieux et sur la terre, il est des Signes pour des gens qui craignent (Allah).
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna fī ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri wamā khalaqa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin liqawmin yattaqūna
